quotes.text: The best way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.text: Every day may not be good, but there’s something good in every day.
quotes.author: Alice Morse Earle

quotes.text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D’Angelo

quotes.text: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the little voice at the end of the day that says I'll try again tomorrow.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.text: Gratitude turns what we have into enough.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.text: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie
